ingredients.item: 1 small fennel bulb, halved and thinly sliced
½ x 25g pack fresh basil, shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the fennel, onion and potato for 5 minutes.
Stir in the chopped tomatoes with the olives and 100ml water. Cover and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Add the cod to the pan, pressing down into the sauce. Cover and cook gently for 6-7 minutes or until the cod is just cooked through. Sprinkle over the basil and a drizzle of olive oil and serve.
